content: {A笑眯眯}Thank you for inviting me, <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>. I'm Frostia, and I'm currently pursuing my studies in mysticism. The twinkling night sky is what I love the most, yeep~.
info: NPC欢迎仪式-单人模版-1005幻雪_幻雪

content: I see. My sincerest apologies~ I had subconsciously connected everything to thesis material just now. Well then, once I finish this cup of afternoon tea, I'll be on my way.
info: NPC欢迎仪式-单人模版-1005幻雪_幻雪

content: Everything's ready. Welcome to your new home!
info: NPC欢迎仪式-单人模版-1005幻雪_幻雪

content: Black tea with an encyclopedia, coffee with my thesis. Once I've sorted my things out, I'd like to invite everyone to join me for afternoon tea. <style=SizeSmall>Just... please keep your distance if I'm stargazing. Yeep...</style>

content: Hoho~, thank you all for your warm welcomes. Wishing our new friend a smooth and joyful life here. Now then, today's welcome party has come to a wonderful end!
info: NPC欢迎仪式-单人模版-1005幻雪_幻雪

content: Thank you for the invitation, <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, {A笑眯眯}I'm Frostia, and I'm currently pursuing my studies in mysticism. If you encounter any mysterious phenomena, please do let me know.

content: <style=NpcName>Frostia</style>~! What a mysterious name... Even the grass by your door feels mysteriously fresh and tender. {A想象中}Ah, maybe we could go for a walk together sometime...?

content: {A喜欢}Cake goes with black tea, and coffee goes with thesis. Once I've finished tidying up, come join me for afternoon tea~. <style=SizeSmall>Just... please keep your distance when I'm stargazing. For safety...</style>
info: NPC欢迎仪式-单人模版-1005幻雪_幻雪

content: Now, let's welcome <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, the owner of this Planet, to say a few words!

content: Yeep? Who's calling—<style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, is that you? Are you calling me because...{短暂停} there's been a mysterious phenomenon?!
